greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) is the n-th number m that divides n^m + 1 (or 0 if m does not exist).
program: (PARI) a(n) = {my(c=0, m=0); while(c<n, m++; if(Mod(n, m)^m==-1, c++)); m; } \\ _Jinyuan Wang_, Mar 25 2020
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Mar 20 2020
